author: mattmann
msg: 1.0.0 initial stable release of CAS curator. This has been a long time coming. Thanks to (in alphabetical order): ahart, cgoodale, mattmann and pramirez for all contributions to this release. See CHANGES.txt file for a full list of changes in this release. This release includes features to support data curation and ingestion into the file manager. User-drive met extraction from the staging area, and file manager catalog, drag and drop ingestion task creation and management.
